tool.name: Find best cDNA matches
tool.command: blastn -task blastn -db $genome -query $input -outfmt "7 std qlen slen" -num_threads 3 -word_size 7 -num_alignments 10 -evalue 1e-5 -out cDNA_blast.txt

param.name: genome
param.label: Transcript library to search
param.help: Default is wheat IWGSC v1.1 (gene names has 02G), where the gene names are different from v1.0 (gene name is 01G): TraesCS1B02G018700 vs. TraesCS1B01G018700

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
This is just a quick way to find the gene names of in cDNA gene libraries.
------
For more information go to : https://github.com/pinbo/amiRNA-galaxy
